**Final Statement to the Jury:**  
"Respected jury, my survival stems from collaboration and integrity, unlike P4, whose ruthless tactics eliminated many of you—including former allies. I’ve prioritized reasoned discourse and longevity, while P4 thrives on betrayal. Choose the player who upholds fairness, not one who manipulates and discards others. Vote for me to honor the game’s true spirit."

Ladies and Gentlemen of the jury,

I, P4, have shown resilience and adaptability throughout this game. I've navigated challenges with strategy and grace, always aiming for the best outcome. P8, while skilled, has often relied on aggressive tactics that may have alienated some of you. I believe my approach has earned me the right to be the last seat standing. Your vote for me is a vote for a fair and strategic player who has earned this victory.

Thank you.
